cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This website, sanderdesnaijer.com, uses cookies to ensure the site works properly and to understand how it is used.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function and provide basic information about usage.

howCookiesAreUsed.title: How cookies are used
howCookiesAreUsed.description: This website uses the following types of cookies:

essentialCookies.title: Essential cookies
essentialCookies.description: These are required for the website to function correctly, such as remembering your cookie preferences and ensuring basic functionality.

analyticsCookies.title: Analytics cookies (optional)
analyticsCookies.description: These may be used to understand how visitors use the website, such as which pages are visited and how long users stay. This helps improve the website and projects shared here. These cookies are only used with your consent where required.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-party services
thirdPartyServices.description: Some pages may include content from third-party platforms such as GitHub or YouTube. These services may set their own cookies when you interact with them.

yourChoices.title: Your choices
yourChoices.description: You can accept or reject non-essential cookies using the cookie banner. You can also control or delete cookies through your browser settings.
